actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow certain individuals a deduction for the expenses of operating a motor vehicle to transport their children to public schools.

summary.text: Allows qualified individuals a tax deduction under the Internal Revenue Code for the expenses of operating a motor vehicle to transport their children to public schools.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow certain individuals a deduction for the expenses of operating a motor vehicle to transport their children to public schools.
